      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  MaxIdleNeighbourSelection<V extends Variable<V,T>,T extends Value<V,T>>
      Simple extension of a provided NeighbourSelection that halts the construction heuristic or the IFS search when the underlying heuristic is unable to improve the number of assigned variables.
